Synopsis: Retrieves detailed information about an IP address using the ip-api.com service.
Description: This function retrieves detailed information about the specified IP address using the ip-api.com service. It provides details such as country, region, city, ISP, and more.
Notes: This function requires an active internet connection to retrieve IP address information from the ip-api.com service.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-IpAddressInformation -IP "8.8.8.8"
Retrieves information about the IP address "8.8.8.8" using the ip-api.com service.
